testsuite.test:
getAvailableApplications Should return an array
Instructions: Follow the instructions on the screen.
Expected behaviour: See green colored line on the device screen.

Start CALCULATOR
Instructions: Click 'GO', should launch the calculator.
Expected behaviour: Did the calculator start?

Start MEDIAPLAYER with virtual widgethome test audio song mp3
Instructions: Click 'GO', should launch an the music player and play a tune.
Expected behaviour: Did the music player start AND play the file?

Start MEDIAPLAYER with virtual music test audio song mp3
Instructions: 1) Make sure the audio file '/virtual/music/test-audio/song.mp3' exists! 2) Click 'GO', should launch an the music player and play a tune.
Expected behaviour: Did the music player start AND play the file?

Start MAIL to email vodafone de
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO', to init email to 'email@vodafone.de'. 2) Close email app (if it opened) and come back to this app.
Expected behaviour: Did email to 'email@vodafone.de' get initiated?

launchApplication Open website vodafone de
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO', to open browser with 'vodafone.de'. 2) Close browser (if it opened) and come back to this app.
Expected behaviour: Did browser open the page 'vodafone.de'?

launchApplication Create a calendar event
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO', to open calendar. 2) Close calendar and come back to this app.
Expected behaviour: Did calendar app open?

launchApplication Try start ALARM
Instructions: 1) Click 'GO', should launch 'ALARM'. 2) Close app (if it opened) and come back to this app.
Expected behaviour: Did app launch?

Instructions: 1) Click 'GO', should launch 'BROWSER'. 2) Close app (if it opened) and come back to this app.
